subject: Task Completed: Member List Implementation
content:
Successfully completed melo-v2-member-list-p2-2-e task. 

Implemented Discord-style member list component with:
✅ Role-based grouping (owner/admin/moderator/member/restricted)
✅ Online/offline sections with accurate counts
✅ Real-time presence updates via Matrix SDK
✅ Collapsible role sections with persistent state
✅ Profile card integration
✅ Typing indicators
✅ Complete Matrix backend integration

Files Created:
- apps/web/components/server/server-member-list.tsx (11.8KB)

All success criteria met. Component is production-ready.
